parlimenthuwe shabda paripalana paddhathiya thula athiwu thakshanika doshaya kisiyam kumanthranakari wadapiliwelak nisa siduwuwak  nowana bawa kathanayaka karu jayasuriya prakasha kala.parlimenthu katayuthu  ada perawaru 9.30 ta aarambha wu awasthawedi prakashayak sidukaramin kathanayakawaraya kiya sitiye eeye siduwu mema siddhiya pilibandawa parikshanayak sidukala bawayi.2002, 2003, 2004 yana wasarawalada mewani siduwim athiwi thibu bawath parlimenthuwe shabda paripalana paddhathiya wasara 15 k pamana parani bawath ohu mehidi awadharanaya kala.emenma mema wasara awasan wimata pera parlimenthu shabda paripalana paddhathiya nawikaranaya karana bawada kathanayakawaraya ehidi kiya sitiya.me athara mudal amathya rawi karunanayakata erehiwa eekabaddha wipakshaya idiripath kala wishwasabhanga yojanawa me wanawita parlimenthuwe wiwadayata ganenawa.
